categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Cilas Veckon was an officer of the Imperial Navy.

During the Galactic Civil War, Admiral Veckon acted as the Chief of Imperial Navy Recruitment in the Office of the Imperial Navy. His name became well known due to his strongly worded recruitment messages sent to potential recruits.
He placed Commanders Gunham, Zhanks and Landau on Tatooine, Corellia and Naboo, respectively, to oversee major pushes in recruitment following the Battle of Yavin.
